input_template.name: Internal Template
input_template.notes: Template used for submitting new item groups by internal users
input_template.creator: Mark V Sullivan

element.acronym: Enter the title of your chapter, article, report, or other material here.
Enter the any additional titles for your material here.
Select the type which best categorizes this material.

element_data.options: Aerial, Archival, Artifact, Audio, Book, Map, Newspaper, Photograph, Serial, Video

element.acronym: Enter any additional data (such as extent or subtype) which describes the material.
Enter the language(s) of the material.
Enter each person or group which created this material. Personal names should be entered as [Family Name], [Given Name].

Enter the name(s) of the publisher(s) of the larger body of work. If your work is currently unpublished, you may enter your name as the publisher or leave the field blank. If you are adding administrative material (newsletters, handbooks, etc.) on behalf of a department within the university, enter the name of your department as the publisher.
Enter the location the material was published.
Enter the year in which your material was published. If your material has not been published, enter the current year or leave the field blank.
Enter your abstract here. If your material does not have an abstract, you may include a summary of your document here.
Enter any additional information that is important for describing your material. Include significant keywords or other data useful for finding your material in a citation-only search.

panel.name: Viewers for this resource in UFDC
